content: I loved this writing. Had an argument over a decade ago with a CDC doctor who insisted Gadasil given to girls would be enough to take care of the virus and vaccinating boys would be silly. History proves the point that “fixing” just one gender to solve a problem does not a healthy society make. Keep up the writing; It’s completely entertaining and thought provoking. Good job. PS Typo toward end: “right now. so I think ”
